trends: there has been one other sighting in cms\tg n\a
there were no other sightings in cms\tg n\a on or around september 17th 2007
Summary: White Glowing Large Egg Shaped UFO
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was at Nite on the Interstate Highway,I saw a Large Egg Shaped UFO Following myself and Family in our car,for 15 min until I told my friend Mitchell to stop at the Next Rest Stop off the Highway,when we pulled over into the Rest Area,me and my Family saw the White Glowing Egg Shaped UFO Fly Closer to our car,It was just floating in place watching us,I told my friend Mitchell to get back on the Highway,as we were pulling out of the Rest Stop,the Egg Shaped UFO Shot off into the nite Sky in a Flash, it flew passed some clouds towards the stars in three sec)Three months before in the Summer of 2007 were had a Close Call in New Mexico,near the White Sands Missle Range,with Red Glowing UFO'S at Nite,I think we may be hunted by these things,why I wish I knew!
